post:
Hello All,

We have some new released special's for LET after a demand for SSD Storage, availability while they last!

**NVME 15GB**  
15GB RAID 1 NVME  
1 Shared CPU Thread (E3-1275 v5)  
2GB DDR4 ECC RAM  
1Gbps Shared  
2TB Outgoing Bandwidth  
1 IPv4  
KVM Virt  
Multiple ISO Choices (Including Windows)  
DC Location : Hetzner  

Please state your required OS in Order Form, setup within 24 hours  
$48/Year  
[Order](https://billing.zxhost.co.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=72)  

**NVME 35GB**  
35GB RAID 1 NVME  
1 Shared CPU Thread (E3-1275 v5)  
4GB DDR4 ECC RAM  
1Gbps Shared  
4TB Outgoing Bandwidth  
1 IPv4  
KVM Virt  
Multiple ISO Choices (Including Windows)  
DC Location : Hetzner  

Please state your required OS in Order Form, setup within 24 hours  
$7/Month  
[Order](https://billing.zxhost.co.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=73)  

**SSD 35GB**  
35GB RAID 1 SSD   
1 Dedicated CPU Thread (AMD Ryzen 7 1700X)  
4GB DDR4 RAM  
1Gbps Shared  
4TB Outgoing Bandwidth  
1 IPv4  
KVM Virt  
Multiple ISO Choices (Including Windows)  
DC Location : Hetzner  

Please state your required OS in Order Form, setup within 3-4 days from time of post (adjusted billing date), 24 hours after
$7/Month  
[Order](https://billing.zxhost.co.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=74)  


**Extras**  
 - Multiple VM's of the same type can be combined into a single larger VM (Please state on order form)  
 - Extra storage can be provided via SSH/SCP locally within Hetzner @ **$5/TB/Month** ,Can be mounted locally(remote access available on per user case) - Available as addon on order page  
 - Anything else feel free to email sales (at) zxhost.co.uk  

[T&C](https://zxhost.co.uk/terms.html)
